import { Row, Col, Space, Tooltip, Image } from "antd"; import Link from "next/link"; import Favorites from "./Favorites"; const Banner = ({ setModalVisible, openSettings, profile, favAuthors, followers, }) => { return (

{profile?.username}

30 followers 350 followings

{profile.biography && profile?.biography.length > 140 ? `${profile?.biography.slice(0, 140)}...` : profile?.biography}

setModalVisible(true)}> See all >>>

{/* */}
); }; export default Banner;
